etomica.models.co2

Class PNGCPM

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.potential.PotentialMolecular
      • etomica.models.co2.PNGCPM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPotential, IPotentialMolecular, PotentialPolarizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PNGCPMX

    public class PNGCPM
extends PotentialMolecular
implements PotentialPolarizable
    Generic GCPM potential class, capable of handling both CO2 and water. The potential takes an AtomTypeAgentManager that is responsible for returning parameters for each atom. Cross-parameters are computing using mixing rules published in http://dx.doi.org/10.1063/1.3519022
